levels.levelDescription: Traverse the Cursed Sands of Despair, where the pink grains whisper tales of sorrow and lost souls. Beware the deep dark holes that hide beneath the shifting sands, ready to swallow the unwary traveler whole.

Journey through the Frostbitten Tundra Expanse, where icy winds howl through the snow-covered landscape. Steer clear of the treacherous frozen waters that threaten to freeze the bravest adventurer to their core.

Enter the eerie Ruins of the Shadowed Citadel, where fractured wall platforms hang precariously over rivers of molten lava. In the heart of this forsaken place lies the legendary lich king Zarothus the Damned, surrounded by his malevolent aura of darkness.
